original_text: Therefore the wrath of the Lord came on Judah and Jerusalem, and he has made them an object of horror, of astonishment, and of hissing, as you see with your own eyes.
korean_text: 여호와께서 유다와 예루살렘에 진노하시고 내버리사 두려움과 놀람과 비웃음거리가 되게 하신 것을 너희가 똑똑히 보는 바라

sentences.original_text: Therefore the wrath of the Lord came on Judah and Jerusalem,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 주의 진노가 유다와 예루살렘에 임하였고,

sentences.original_text: and he has made them an object of horror, of astonishment, and of hissing,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들을 놀라움과 경악과 비웃음의 거리가 되게 하셨으니,

sentences.original_text: as you see with your own eyes.
